oai_dc:dc.dc:title: For peace and security, buy bonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This World War II era poster features the Three Wise Men in colorful clothing riding camels toward the Christmas star.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ball, Linn; U.S. Department of the Treasury
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Posters
